statements: SELECT * FROM tax_information ORDER BY tax_id DESC;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name FROM tax_information WHERE tax_amount > 1000;
SELECT tax_id, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE tax_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE taxpayer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM tax_information WHERE tax_amount <= 5000 ORDER BY tax_id ASC;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE tax_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE tax_amount > 1000 ORDER BY tax_date DESC;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE taxpayer_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY tax_id;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE tax_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY tax_amount ASC;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_amount FROM tax_information WHERE tax_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM TaxInformation;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name FROM TaxInformation WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, income, tax_due FROM TaxInformation WHERE tax_due < 1000 ORDER BY tax_due ASC;
SELECT taxpayer_name FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxpayer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_due FROM TaxInformation WHERE income BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000 ORDER BY taxpayer_name DESC;
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, tax_due FROM TaxInformation WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY tax_id DESC
SELECT * FROM TaxInformation WHERE taxpayer_name LIKE '%John%' OR income > 100000 ORDER BY taxpayer_name ASC
SELECT tax_id, SUM(income) AS total_income FROM TaxInformation GROUP BY tax_id HAVING total_income > 300000
SELECT tax_id, taxpayer_name, document_type FROM TaxInformation JOIN TaxDocuments ON TaxInformation.tax_id = TaxDocuments.tax_id WHERE document_type = 'income_statement'
SELECT taxpayer_name, tax_due FROM TaxInformation WHERE tax_due > 5000 ORDER BY tax_due DESC, taxpayer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM tax_documents;
SELECT document_type, document_content FROM tax_documents WHERE document_type = 'Income Statement';
SELECT client_name, client_address FROM tax_clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount FROM tax_transactions;
SELECT client_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM tax_transactions GROUP BY client_id;
SELECT document_id, document_type, upload_date FROM tax_documents ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_address, tax_id FROM tax_clients WHERE client_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM tax_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date;
SELECT client_name, transaction_amount FROM tax_clients JOIN tax_transactions ON tax_clients.client_id = tax_transactions.client_id WHERE transaction_amount < 500;
SELECT document_type, COUNT(*) FROM tax_documents GROUP BY document_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM TaxPayers WHERE taxpayer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM TaxPayers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT document_type, document_name FROM TaxDocuments WHERE taxpayer_id = 3;
SELECT income_amount, tax_year FROM TaxIncome WHERE tax_year = 2021;
SELECT taxpayer_id, tax_year, tax_amount FROM TaxReturns WHERE taxpayer_id = 2 AND tax_year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM TaxPayers WHERE taxpayer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM TaxPayers WHERE tax_id != '123456';
SELECT document_id, document_type, document_name FROM TaxDocuments ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT  tax_year, income_amount FROM TaxIncome WHERE taxpayer_id = 3 ORDER BY tax_year ASC, income_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM TaxReturns WHERE tax_year = 2022 AND tax_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM tax_payers;
SELECT full_name, address FROM tax_payers WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT tax_payer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM tax_records GROUP BY tax_payer_id;
SELECT * FROM tax_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT tax_payers.full_name, tax_documents.document_type FROM tax_payers JOIN tax_documents ON tax_payers.tax_payer_id = tax_documents.tax_payer_id;
SELECT * FROM tax_payers;
SELECT full_name, income FROM tax_payers ORDER BY income DESC;

SELECT tp.full_name, tc.category_name FROM tax_payers tp INNER JOIN tax_records tr ON tp.tax_payer_id = tr.tax_payer_id INNER JOIN tax_categories tc ON tr.category_id = tc.category_id WHERE tr.amount > 10000;
SELECT tp.full_name, td.document_type FROM tax_payers tp LEFT JOIN tax_documents td ON tp.tax_payer_id = td.tax_payer_id WHERE td.document_type IS NOT NULL;

SELECT tp.full_name, tc.category_name, tr.amount, tr.record_date FROM tax_payers tp INNER JOIN tax_records tr ON tp.tax_payer_id = tr.tax_payer_id INNER JOIN tax_categories tc ON tr.category_id = tc.category_id WHERE tr.record_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY tr.amount DESC, tr.record_date ASC;
